description: This document contains a schema for validating an record serialization
title: Schema for Records.

___name.description: The unique reference name of the record's device
___name.title: Schema for Record name fields

___value.description: The assigned value of the record's parsed record point
___value.title: Schema for parsed RecordPoint value fields

___unit.description: The assigned pint units of the record's parsed record point
___unit.title: Schema for parsed RecordPoint units fields

___timestamp.description: Time that the record was created
___timestamp.title: Schema for Record timestamp fields

___type.description: Must be one of the supported devices types, by name
___type.title: Schema for Record type fields

___device_name.description: The human readable name of the record's device
___device_name.title: Schema for Record device_name fields

___lat.description: The latitude of this record's device
___lat.title: Schema for Record coord.lat fields

___lon.description: The longitude of this record's device
___lon.title: Schema for Record coord.lon fields

___ttl.description: The time for a record to stay alive
___ttl.title: Schema for Record TTL fields

___name.description: The assigned name for the record point
___name.title: Schema for RecordPoint name fields

___value.description: The stat value of the record point
___value.title: Schema for RecordPoint value fields

___unit.description: The assigned pint units for the record point
___unit.title: Schema for RecordPoint units fields
